meanings.sent1: The new recipe remained untested, so we weren't sure if it would taste good.
meanings.sent2: The untested theory needed to be experimented on to see if it was correct.
meanings.sent3: The untested roller coaster design left the engineers feeling a bit nervous.
meanings.sent4: Her untested skills in painting blossomed beautifully on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The untested bridge swayed in the wind, making everyone hesitant to cross.

meanings.sent1: The untested medicine could have unknown side effects.
meanings.sent2: The untested hypothesis required further research to confirm its accuracy.
meanings.sent3: His untested excuse for being late raised suspicion among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The untested software update caused unexpected errors on the computer.
meanings.sent5: The untested alibi fell apart under scrutiny during the investigation.
